marklogic.body: I agree sir. This site is awesome and the people here are quite humourous! Im Glad you responded because certainly no one would waste thier time to comment on a site specifically for cat breading by bashing it! Why that person would themselves the biggest douchewaffle that ever dared to call themselves a human being. And they shouldnt even kindly die. They should die a horrible cancerous death that would make the devil himself Vomit.
